item.title: The Dooleys - Wanted
item.description:
You’re the kind of guy
that I gotta keep away
but it’s
all right
you know
you can’t deny
it’s the price
I’ve gotta pay
but it’s all right
‘cause though
your lips are
sweet as honey
your heart is made of
solid stone
one look and boy
you got me running
I bet you saw me
coming after
you alone
wanted
boy you’re everything
I ever wanted
now all I’ve got’s
a memory I’m haunted
living in the shadow
of your love
boy you know
you’ve got me
‘cause you’re
wanted
boy you’ve everything
I ever needed
but now
you’ve gone and
let me down
and cheated
living in the shadow
of your love-
I’m the kind
of girl
that’ll swallow
every line
but it’s
all right
you only
gotta call
and I’ll be there
any time
and it’s
all right
and now the flames
are getting higher
I’ll losing
all myself control
so come on boy and
feed the fire
I’m burning
with desire
don’t you leave me
cold Wanted
boy you’re everything
I ever wanted
now all I’ve got’s
a memory I’m haunted
living in the shadow
of your love

you’ve got me
‘cause you’re

I ever needed
but now
you’ve gone and

and cheated

of your love-
